Introduction.content:
Kuku Rider was the fastest chicken in the whole village.

He rode a tiny red boda-boda made from a matchbox and bottle caps.

One day he saw Henny Penny at the market and fell in love instantly.

He honked his little horn: BEEP BEEP!

Henny Penny blushed and dropped her maize.

Chapter 1.chapter_title: The Proposal at the Grinding Mill
Chapter 1.content:
Kuku Rider stopped his bike and said,

“Henny Penny, will you marry me?”

She flapped her wings and shouted, “YES!”

![Chicken proposing on tiny boda-boda](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-proposal-bike/800/600)

All the other chickens clapped with their wings.

Chapter 2.content:
Henny Penny’s father was a big white rooster.

He said, “Dowry must be 50 kilos of the best layers mash!”

Kuku Rider worked day and night delivering eggs to pay.

![Chicken carrying heavy sack of feed](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-dowry-sack/800/600)

He finally paid on the last day.

Chapter 3.content:
The night before the wedding, all the roosters had a party.

They crossed the road just because they could!

They danced until sunrise.

![Chickens dancing and crossing road](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-party-dance/800/600)

One rooster fell asleep in the middle of the road and became omelette.

Chapter 4.content:
The wedding was beautiful!

- Bride wore white feathers
- Groom wore a tiny black helmet
- DJ was a loud rooster playing Bongo Flava

![Chicken bride and groom kissing](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-wedding-kiss/800/600)

The priest (a confused human) said, “I now pronounce you hen and rooster!”

Chapter 5.content:
After the party, Kuku Rider and Henny Penny rode away on the red boda-boda.

They went to the lake for honeymoon.

![Two chickens riding into sunset](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-honeymoon-sunset/800/600)

They laid many eggs and lived happily… until Sunday when someone wanted chicken soup.

Conclusion.content:
The little red boda-boda is now in a museum.

Children visit and laugh every day.

![Museum sign: World’s First Chicken Boda-Boda](https://picsum.photos/seed/chicken-bike-museum/800/600)

Moral: Love can happen anywhere… even between two chickens on a matchbox motorcycle!

The end.
